DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety pharmacokinetics new patch formulation ( tape ) E2022 conduct patch test .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Comparative Study E2022 Current New Patch Formulations
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion 1 . Nonsmoker smoke 4 week longer study treatment 2 . BMI screen great equal 18.5 kg/m2 less 25.0 kg/m2 3 . With write informed consent 4 . Given full explanation study willing able comply study requirement . Exclusion criterion ( Cohort 1 2 ) : 1 . Have disorder affect evaluation study drug psychiatric , gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , endocrinological , hematological , neurological , cardiovascular system , congenital metabolic abnormality 2 . Have clinically significant abnormality organ dysfunction 3 . Have history allergy drug food require medical treatment seasonal allergy screen 4 . Have history complication contact dermatitis atopic dermatitis 5 . Have hairy back shave within 4 week study treatment 6 . Have skin disease ( e.g. , eczema , dermatitis , dyschromatosis ) , skin damage ( e.g. , injury , scar , sun burn ) may affect skin assessment 7 . Have history suspect drug alcohol dependence , positive urine drug screen baseline day screen 8 . Have caffeinecontaining drink food , alcohol within 72 hour study treatment 9 . Have use liquid product ( include cosmetic ) , applied patch , tape , bandage back within 4 week study treatment 10 . Had hard exercise least 5 day week 1hour longer hard exercise within 2 week study treatment ( Only Cohort 2 ) : 1 . Meet QTc great 450 millisecond screen immediately study treatment 2 . Had nutrient , herb preparation ( e.g . oriental medicine ) , food drink ( e.g. , grapefruitcontaining juice ) may affect activity drugmetabolizing enzyme transporter within 2 week study treatment 3 . Had St. John 's Wortcontaining preparation within 4 week Period 1 application
